ShadowSender
AdvancedSendersEndpoint
Collection of Senders, that are executed all at the same time. Once the results are processed, all results will be sent to the resultSender, while the original sender will return its result to the pipeline.

Multiple sub-senders can be configured within the ShadowSender, the minimum amount of senders is 2 (originalSender + resultSender)

See also
Github - ShadowSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.senders.ShadowSender
Syntax
Copy
<ShadowSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
originalSender	text	the first sender specified
Name of the sender that is considered that is considered to be the golden standard, i.e. the source of truth.
resultSender	text	the last sender specified
The sender name which will process the results
waitForShadowsToFinish	bo
